channel.title: HighScore command for server

item.title: HighScore command for server
item.dc:creator: @dention1 dention1
item.description:
@dention1 wrote:

Does anybody know of a high scores command?
If you cant find one can someone show me where i should place this and how i can make this into a ::highscores command?

//In-game highscores
public int playerRank = 0;

public void resetRanks() {
for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
server.ranks[i] = 0;
server.rankPpl[i] = “”;
if (playerRights >= 2) {
playerRank = 0;
totalz = 0;
}
}
}
public void highscores() {
clearQuestInterface();
sendQuest("@dbl@", 8144); //Title
sendQuest("@dre@~In-Game Top 10 Highscores~", 8145);
for(int i = 0; i < 10; i++) { // you also need to change this for it to display more, simply the number you want it to display, say 20 = for(int i = 0; i < 20; i++)
if(server.ranks[i] > 0) {
sendQuest("@bla@Rank “+(i+1)+”: @red@"+server.rankPpl[i]+ "@bla@ - Total Lvl:@whi@ " +server.ranks[i], 8147+i);
}
}
sendQuestSomething(8143);
showInterface(8134);
flushoutStream();
resetRanks();
}
//end highscores

I got this from a random source. Btw my server runs on pk points.

Read full topic
